alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 08 at 3:22PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the lower elevations, and 10 to 14 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...Star Valley and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...Through 5 PM Wednesday. The heaviest snow is expected tonight, especially before midnight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will primarily impact the morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley
